item.title: Neti neti method on Lsd
item.description:
in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality

LSD is so freaking powerful you don't need audios to produce samadhi or enlightenment. Just sit and contemplate, "What is consciousness?" or a similar question. In fact, the videos and audios are distracting you from that. Don't consume media on psychedelics. That's like watching porn while you're having sex.

Crank up your dose and you will have a full awakening. Just be careful what you wish for. Can you handle the Truth?

item.title: Legal psychedelics
item.description:
in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality

Salvia for sure. But be careful what you wish for. Salvia will skull-fuck you. You are better off drinking some San Pedro cactus if you're a newbie, or something like that.

item.title: 5-meo-dmt Legality In Europe
item.description:
in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality

Just because a thing isn't explicitly on a ban list doesn't mean they will treat you kindly if they catch you with it. That's not how the law works. The law is rarely clear, simple, or black and white.

Which is just another example of nonduality. It's too hard for governments to make absolute distinctions because all distinctions are fluid and ever-evolving.

item.title: Was Plotinus ( Roman Philosopher ) Enlightened ?
item.description:
in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality
2 hours ago, LfcCharlie4 said:

I’m interested to hear your guys thoughts on the statement “Non-Duality isn’t enlightenment” 

It's silly hairsplitting.

Enlightenment is oneness. Nonduality is oneness.

Oneness is an absolute which includes manyness within it. True Oneness does not create a division between oneness and manyness, nor does it preclude such a division from being made by those minds who wish to make it. In other words, relativity. If you look at the world looking for oneness, you will see it. If you look at the world looking for manyness, you will see it. Because your mind creates the world you see.

item.title: The Power of Traditional Psychotherapy (and Psychiatry)
item.description:
in Self-Actualization
2 hours ago, d0ornokey said:

@Leo Gura how would you define a really good one? 

Well, that's a deep topic. But to me the therapist needs to have a deep grasp of consciousness and trans-personal psychology. They need to know how to think outside the box, not just blindly conform to some cookie-cutter psychoanalytical ideology. They need a metaphysical grasp of the ego, and some degree of personal transcendence of ego.

Without the above, the therapist is basically corrupt and deluded. It then becomes like the blind leading the blind.

Imagine if Jordan Peterson was your therapist. God help you.

Then again, it all depends on what your goals are. I am biased towards profound goals with this work. If your goals are more modest, like fixing some minor relationship problem or weight problem, then you don't need such a deeply grounded therapist. Some hack will do.

But if you're going to be doing psychedelics, you're gonna be more conscious than your therapist and your existential issues will be above the therapist's head. In this case the therapist will drag you down into her own delusional materialist "reality". For example, you might tell your therapist that death isn't real or that you are God, and she will tell you you're crazy. But really, she is projecting her own delusion onto you. Because in this case she is the crazy one pretending to be sane. She's just not conscious enough to understand psychological work at such deep levels.

item.title: The Power of Traditional Psychotherapy (and Psychiatry)
item.description:
in Self-Actualization

If you find a really good therapist it can work. The trick here is finding a really good one. And of course the $$$.

You could also do this with a good life coach.

item.title: Does Daygame really work?
item.description:
in Dating, Relationships, Sexuality
On 12/26/2019 at 10:18 AM, TheUniverseIsLove said:

...sleeping with a guy from a cold approach does not make one look like anything, except someone who slept with a guy from a cold approach. 

I never said it does. I was speaking about how it's PERCEIVED by society and many women.

Quote

I am a woman who would sleep with a guy off a cold approach as long as the vibe felt right. I have no fear of being called a slut, or looking like a slut.

Good for you. You are more honest than most. Most women would not admit such a thing.

Quote

As constructive criticism, please check your generalizations about women before you give advice on women. 

Just read my words more carefully. It's important notice what I didn't say as much as noticing what I did say.

The nature of dating advice is dealing with generalizations. Otherwise we couldn't even assume she doesn't have a dick. Dating involves a lot of assumptions. Many, many things must be assumed to succeed in attracting a woman. First and foremost it must be assumed she wants to sleep with you -- which is a rather bold assumption.

item.title: How is it that God exists?
item.description:
in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality

God created itself. How is that possible? Because God is ONE, it cannot be limited from the outside, since there is no outside. So it is able to do the "impossible". In truth, there is no such thing as impossible for Infinity. So it becomes possible to create oneself.

item.title: "You are already whole and complete" - Is that really true?
item.description:
in Self-Actualization
46 minutes ago, MAYA EL said:

@Leo Gura so I take it tou can self reproduce?  Because as far as I know the opposite sex is needed in order to not only keep the species alive but also to reach higher understanding / awakening that cannot be obtained when single and without kids. And this is a universal fundamental part of every single human beings existence . 

That all depends on your definiton of "self".

The Self I am can reproduce in infinite ways without sex. But if you believe you are a human, then you're stuck. But then again, reproduction is meaningless unless you give it meaning.

For example, I can reproduce myself through words and videos because I do not limit my self to biology as you choose to do. I reproduce myself in your mind. And my reproduction will outlive your children's children.

You should understand that reproduction is a total fiction. Ask yourself why you subscribe to this fiction.

item.title: "Just say Merry Christmas or else you're being hurtful"
item.description:
in Society, Environment, Government, Politics
On 12/26/2019 at 7:50 AM, tenta said:

 

 

Lol, facepalm.

That's how Christian self-bias distorts one's perception of reality.

If Christian dogma is taken as a given, anything smelling of "secularism" will appear wrong, evil, and unfair.

1 hour ago, tenta said:

Trump is a bad representative of the values they claim to have, he only has to reflect willful ignorance or callousness to get elected

Actually, Trump is a perfect reflection of their ACTUAL values. What you have to take into account is that people bullshit about their values all the time. When a low consciousness person says they value love, justice, equality, freedom, honesty, humility, morality, etc. they only say that, but in practice they cannot actually live those values. They live at the same level they vote at. Voting, after all, is living!

Stage Blue Christians project a veneer of Turquoise values but live at Stage Blue values.

So someone like Prager can talk about being moral and good and Christian, but when it comes down to it, he will have no problem criminalizing or even killing Muslims, homosexuals, and witches.

You can't fake the values you actually live by. But you can certainly fool yourself and others around you, which is what Prager has done.

The function of all PragerU videos is for Dennis Prager to convince himself and his friends of his own bullshit. And anyone who appears in his videos is doing the same, including JP and the like. It is a textbook definition of self-bias. Ta-da!

item.title: If Life has No Meaning, Why Repetetive Numbers?
item.description:
in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality
5 minutes ago, Rasheed said:

What would have happened? I would probably fall down in some sort of trap. All because I dismissed the signs. 

Whatever would have happened, it would have been meaningless unless you also created a meaning for it, which of course you have already done in your head. You tell yourself that missing these "signs" would be bad. And so that becomes true for you because you say so.

The trap you fell down is the trap of unconsciously creating meaning. And this trap too is meaningless unless you give it meaning.

You create meaning unconsciously as part of your blind survival drive.

item.title: If Life has No Meaning, Why Repetetive Numbers?
item.description:
in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality
10 minutes ago, Rasheed said:

What happened was: At first I started seeing the numbers. Then, I searched the meaning

Exactly. That is proof you created the meaning.

If a thing had inherent meaning, you couldn't search for its meaning. It's meaning couldn't start at zero, and all animals in the universe would agree on its meaning.

See the error in your logic.

The numbers 1 or 2 are totally meaningless symbols. To a dog these numbers mean nothing precisely because these numbers mean nothing until you decide they mean something to you.

Not only is 1111 meaningless, the number 1 is meaningless. It is not even a number to a dog. And so is every other piece of language. Even getting raped or murdered is meaningless. Until you give it a meaning.

You really are not getting this whole business of relativity. Go watch my video Understanding Relativism and contemplate what relativity is.

item.title: If Life has No Meaning, Why Repetetive Numbers?
item.description:
in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality
14 hours ago, Rasheed said:

As I said above, I can't agree with that.

I researched it. I did not know what it they meant at first (0 meaning). After the research and study. I found the answers. (Meaning) 

Hehehe... THAT is you creating meaning!

If something had zero meaning, and then acquired a meaning one day, on that day, you created the meaning. In this case, by "research amd study".

You are creating meaning unconsciously. Because you are living unconsciously, like an animal. A human is a meaning-creating animal.

How could something have zero meaning unless it was meaningless to begin with?

You are unconsciously creating meaning by outsourcing it to other humans and authority figures so that you can deny that YOU are responsible. You will say, "But so and so said so!" Yes, and that is you giving so and so meaning and authority over your life. Why do you choose to believe so and so? Only because you are not conscious for yourself and giving away your authority to him.

If so and so told you to jump off a cliff, you'd do it and think it was meaningful.

item.title: How is it that God exists?
item.description:
in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality
15 hours ago, Beginner Mind said:

Is that the closest we can come to knowing how God exists?

No. There's a lot of muddled talk in this thread. The clear answer is this: you can become directly conscious of what God is, why it is, and where it came from.

Be careful with falling into the "I don't know" trap. People say "I don't know" thinking that's all there is. But there's actually something here that you haven't discovered yet which you can discover. You can discover precisely what God is. God is not an idea.

item.title: "You are already whole and complete" - Is that really true?
item.description:
in Self-Actualization
2 hours ago, Nivsch said:

So how it gets along with the "whole and complete" message, It feels to me there is a contradiction here.

How can I transmit to other people this attractive state, if I don't believe that this is fundamentally true?

There is some significant degree of truth in this attractive attitude, but its still limited and not completely true.

The contradiction comes from you not being fully conscious of what you are. If you were fully conscious of what you are, you'd realize you are whole and complete. But an ego cannot ever be whole and complete by definition. So you're stuck in an existential bind until such time as you awaken and realize your true nature. But in your current state of conscious you believe you are a limited human self, so of course you will also act in a needy way which will repel others. The less conscious you are, the more needy you are, the more people don't like being around you because your selfishness is repulsive.

Detachment cannot be faked. You must actually become detached.

item.title: Finding God's Will
item.description:
in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality
32 minutes ago, John Doe said:

@Leo Gura  So the terms "Absolute Love" and "Absolute Good" seem to have absolutely no meaning. God is 'neutral', after all? You're just referring to the neutrality with flowery terms such as "Good" and "Love". Sorry if this comes across as confrontational, just trying to further my understanding.

No, if I meant neutral I would have said neutral.

Reality is NOT neutral. It is Absolute Good/Love. You won't be able to understand this from your current state of consciousness because ego is in the way.

The terms have very clear meaning, but you lack the necessary reference experiences to make sense of them, so from your POV they seem to have no meaning.

It's like I am describing love to a person who has never felt it.

item.title: Here's how to solve the simulation paradigm.
item.description:
in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality

You are misusing the word simulation. Consciousness is not simulating anything, it is everything. That's a big and important difference.

You don't say that atoms are simulating trees, or wood is simulating a chair. Atoms ARE trees. Wood IS a chair.

item.title: Should I go deeper into this work?
item.description:
in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality

@aklacor727 It took many years for my intellectual and metaphysical curiosity to develop into a serious pursuit of awakening. You don't just start serious spiritual practice overnight. You gotta mature into it through learning, study, and basic self-help. So your desire to learn is all good. It's just the early stages of this process.

Start by making your life the way you want it to be, before you go chasing enlightenment. Learn how to survive well.

item.title: Marjuana Trip Report: I killed God and Myself
item.description:
in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality

@EntheogenTruthSeeker Sounds like that will backfire on you.

Be careful with addictive substances. That is the opposite of our work here.

You ain't gonna be awake and addicted to weed at the same time.

item.title: Does being ever get boring
item.description:
in Self-Actualization

Ideally speaking, bordem is a reaction of the ego-mind.

In practice though, until you deeply awaken and purify the mind through 1000s of hours of meditation, you will suffer lots of bordem. It's a survival function.

There is no way around bordem, you must go through it.

Extreme mindfulness is required for things not to lose their magic. Survival necessarily makes things lose their magic because magic is not important to survival. Magic is a quality of pure Being.

item.title: Question about God imaginating reality
item.description:
in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality
26 minutes ago, TheUniverseIsLove said:

Why does the infinite imagine itself as a trillion finite selves to make creation?

Love

To share itself with itself.

Quote

Would it not create without this illusion, in and of itself?

Creation is nothing but illusion.

in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality

Atheists, skeptics and agnostics, too

Obviously

item.title: Question about God imaginating reality
item.description:
in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality

Infinite Self imagines it is a trillion finite selves. Otherwise there could not be finite selves.

The illusion is necessary for creation to happen. An infinite thing has no shape or form. If it wants to materialize anything it must take on some limited, finite form. And then of course by definition this limited, finite form cannot understand the infinite.

So reality is stuck in a bind. Either it can be infinite or finite. If it is infinite it loses all form and becomes unremarkable. If it decides to have form, it loses its infinity. You are stuck in this bind.

in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality

@actualizing25 Whether something works for you depends on how seriously you go about it. The magic is less in the technique and more in your dedication to it. You are the bottleneck.

item.title: Question RE: Why Reality CANNOT Be A Simulation
item.description:
in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality

@Debil The mistake you're making is that you believe YOU are a being with senses. This is untrue. That's the delusion of ego.

You do NOT have consciousness or senses! Consciousness is imagining being human and having senses.

You are trying to give Mario an ego. Which is just doubling down on the delusion. What you must realize is that you are not really a living being.

item.title: How to Improve Vocal Projection and Tonality
item.description:
in Dating, Relationships, Sexuality

You can just train your voice in the shower. Singing is good, speaking is good, pronouncing words out loud is good. There are many vocal exercises you can do. There are even speak coaches. Roger Love is a great one. He has courses and books.

item.title: About Paul the apostle
item.description:
in Meditation, Consciousness, Enlightenment, Spirituality

@Unjigorjigor A) You're reading it too litterally. Mystical teaching are not meant to read that way.

B) You are almost certianly reading words that were not written my a highly God-realized being.

C) The tragedy of Jesus was that one of the most God-realized people on this planet was executed by his own kind for speaking truth and love. This is the timeless tragedy of mankind. It's not unique to Jesus at all. Jesus "died for our sins" in the sense that ignorant egos killed an egoless man. God killed God. Happens all the time.

The mistake is trying to grant Jesus some kind of unique status. If you do that, you completely miss the point.

The people who worshipped Jesus did not really understand him. So stop taking their words seriously, as if they knew God. When you really know God, Jesus becomes irrelevant.

item.title: Watching Actualized.org even after I've seen the episode
item.description:
in Self-Actualization

There is so much depth in the last 2 years of videos you will have to watch them 5+ times over the next 10-20 years to understand everything that's there to understand.

You can only understand up to the level of development that you're at. As you grow, you will understand more and more nuances that you had previously missed.

The bottleneck is you
